ygData.subject: Re: Pot Molds & Legs
ygData.msgSnippet: hehe okay ...check THIS out then...at the merchant in Kelethin who sells the sketches...he sells TWO large bowl sketches....exact same name...exact same
ygData.messageBody:
hehe okay ...check THIS out then...at the merchant in Kelethin who sells
the sketches...he sells TWO 'large bowl' sketches....exact same
name...exact same price...one at top of inv and one NEAR bottom (its NOT a
sell back he ALWAYS has them) And I remember at least ONCE trying the large
bowl sketch and said quanities don't combine or whatever...so hmm maybe I
got the wrong "large bowl sketch" (hope this is a big mistake to have both
named the same though lol otherwise shame on Verant for being so mean hehe)
I'll buy one of each and see what each says and try that. Thanks for giving
me the correct sketch name at least heh now I just gotta find the right
one!! ;)



At 08:32 PM 7/19/99 -0700, you wrote:
>From: "Kelson Smith" <kelsonbs@...>
>
>well, to alleviate your troubles :) use the large bowl sketch to make mixing
>bowls:
>
>so the recipe goes like this - large bowl sketch, water, two large blocks of
>clay, combine :\)
>
>this is very profitable - for me approximately a 6.3 gold profit per bowl,
>with my skill at 148
>
>hope this helps
